title: Toriko - Aigan Shoujo
description: Since birth, Shinju has been shunned because of her unusual looks. When the aristocrat Shiren adopts her and calls her beautiful, it seems like a dream come true. Little does she know, she will have to pay dearly for that dream...

matches.title: Majo no Koi wa Kindan to Haitoku de Tsukurareru
